AttributeMapItem.Name: ldapSearchFilter
AttributeMapItem.Script: qs = work.getString("http.qs.name") if (qs == null ) qs = "*" return "cn=" + qs

Script.name: Add person
Script.parameter:
person = system.newAttribute("Person")
person.@name = work.cn.getValue() // similar to work.getString("cn") person.Title = work.title person.Type = work.affiliationcode person.Department = work.department
retEntry.Results.appendChild(person)
cnt++

Script.name: Display results
Script.parameter: task.logmsg("Found " + cnt + " records for cn= "+ work.getString("http.qs.name"))

Hook.name: addonly_ok
Hook.Name: addonly_ok
Hook.Script: var partialPath = system.getTDIProperty("filePath2") var fullPath = partialPath + "LDIF-DUMP-" + work.uid + ".ldif" task.logmsg("*****"+fullPath) thisConnector.setConnectorParam("filePath",fullPath)

Hook.name: override_getnext
Hook.Name: override_getnext
Hook.Script: var partialPath = system.getTDIProperty("filePath2") var fullPath = partialPath + "LDIF-DUMP-" + work.uid + ".ldif" task.logmsg("*****"+fullPath) thisConnector.setConnectorParam("filePath",fullPath)

SchemaItem.Name: cn
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MUST/String/RFC4519: common name(s) for which the entity is known by

SchemaItem.Name: l
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/RFC2256: locality which this object resides in

SchemaItem.Name: ou
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/RFC2256: organizational unit this object belongs to

SchemaItem.Name: st
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/String/RFC2256: state or province which this object resides in

SchemaItem.Name: street
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Directory String{128}/RFC2256: street address of this object

SchemaItem.Name: teletexTerminalIdentifier
SchemaItem.NativeSyntax: MAY/Teletex Terminal Identifier/RFC2256: Teletex Terminal Identifier

Hook.name: before_initialize
Hook.Name: before_initialize
Hook.Script: var partialPath = system.getTDIProperty("OutPathGroup") var fullPath = partialPath + "LDIF-DUMP-GRP-" + work.getAttribute("ou") + ".ldif" task.logmsg("*****"+fullPath) thisConnector.setConnectorParam("filePath",fullPath)
